title: Our Research Areas
text:
Advanced Biology Program
                        The Advanced Biology Programme facilitates dialogue on life science policy and develops actionable policies for the Indian bioeconomy
                        Click to learn more
                    
                
            
                
                    
                        
                    
                    
                        Geospatial Research
                        Geospatial Research at Takshashila applies the principles of mapping and spatial analysis to understand real-world problems.
                        Click to learn more
                    
                
            
                
                    
                        
                    
                    
                        High-Technology Geopolitics Program
                        The High-Technology Geopolitics Programme explores the geopolitics of technology from an Indian national interest perspective.
                        Click to learn more
                    
                
            
                
                    
                        
                    
                    
                        Indo-Pacific Studies Program
                        The Indo-Pacific Studies Programme looks at the geopolitical events and actors across the Indo-Pacific and India’s role in the region.
                        Click to learn more
